title: These Vicious Thorns: Tales of the Lovely Grim
description: Thorns donâ€™t always pierce the heart. But sometimes they do.Thorna is a fae queen and has fallen for a mortal who relishes dark tales. Before she reveals her true nature to him, she hopes to win his heart by writing him stories of her own. But when the time comes for the mortal to discover what she truly is, will he accept her love or push her away?Untamed Darkness is a stand alone series of short story collections and novels with a touch of darkness that can be read in any order. These Vicious Thorns is a collection filled with addicting dark tales, twists and turns, and jaw-dropping moments that will leave you yearning for more. Includes stories from the Campfire Fantasy Tales Series along with five brand new ones. Perfect for fans of Silvia Moreno-Garcia, Leigh Bardugo, and Holly Black.
author: Candace Robinson
